title: Meanwhile elsewhere
creator_credit: Hugh Marchant and Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School
brief_description: The saga of the locksmith and his intrepid search for the keys and love. Pain is pleasure, defeat is triumph - in short noogs is noogs.
